abstract: Bank of America’s price for getting Warren E. Buffett’s seal of approval may not be as steep as what Goldman Sachs and General Electric have paid. But it will cost the firm $9.51 a second.
snippet: Bank of America’s price for getting Warren E. Buffett’s seal of approval may not be as steep as what Goldman Sachs and General Electric have paid. But it will cost the firm $9.51 a second.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett is among the nation’s best deal-makers, and in the $5 billion investment he struck with Bank of America, he’s getting a guaranteed profit.

headline.main: What Buffett Is Getting From His Bank of America Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
